original_text: Wherewith shall I come before the Lord, and bow myself before the high God? shall I come before him with burnt offerings, with calves of a year old?
korean_text: 내가 무엇을 가지고 여호와 앞에 나아가며 높으신 하나님께 경배할까 내가 번제물로 일 년 된 송아지를 가지고 그 앞에 나아갈까

sentences.original_text: Wherewith shall I come before the Lord
and bow myself before the high God?
shall I come before him with burnt offerings
with calves of a year old?
